text: Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Fuhuo shi bu hui lailin women.” Ni shuo:“Buran. Zhi wo de zhu fashi, ta bi lailin nimen. Wo de zhu shi quanzhi youxuan de, tiandi jian wei chen zhong de shiwu, buneng yuanli ta; bi na geng xiao de, he geng da de, wu yi jian bu jilu zai yi ben mingbai de jingdian zhong.”
